details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.6.1 Actions General - Named actions
details.description: Named actions other than NextPage, PrevPage, FirstPage, and LastPage shall not be permitted

rule.description: Named actions other than NextPage, PrevPage, FirstPage, and LastPage shall not be permitted

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type
